name: Remove the background from Google Drive images with Picsart
description:
When a new image is added to a monitored folder in Google Drive, Picsart automatically removes the background, then seamlessly uploads the enhanced image back to Google Drive.

This template was created by Picsart and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: apidevsupport@picsart.com.
